title: Assassin's.Creed.IV.BLACK.FLAG-CRACKED.P2P
description:
Assassin's.Creed.IV.BLACK.FLAG-CRACKED.P2P 

In the original: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag 

Developer: Ubisoft Montreal 

Publisher: Ubisoft 

Year: 2013 

Publication Type: pirates [P] 

Tablet: 

Language: Multi (RUS, Eng, etc.) 

Voice set Language: Multi (RUS, Eng, etc.) 

Description: 

Events Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag developed in 1715. Pirates 
ruled caribou and even established their own republic, where corruption, 
greed and cruelty at every step. Amid all this 
disorder can be identified brash young captain named Edward 
Kenuey. His quest for fame he has earned the respect, comparable even with 
Blackbeard, but it also got him into an ancient war between 
Assassins and Templars. A war that could destroy everything 
built by pirates. 

In the role of a pirate-be assassin Edward 
visit more than 50 locations - the islands, towns, ports, fishing villages, 
hidden coves, shipwrecks, sugar plantations and even thick tbestgamer.net 
jungle. In which of these areas and in which order gets Edward 
depends only on the player - the developers have provided a completely open 
world. 

Game is a little buggy, because you need a stable tablet! 

Features: 

Copy the files from the image to your hard drive. 


System requirements: 

Minimum system requirements for the game Assassin Creed 4: 
Operating system: Vista SP2 / 7 SP1 / 8 
Processor: Core 2 Duo E8200 - 2,6 GHz or Athlon II X4 620 / Core 2 Quad Q9400 - 3,0 GHz or Phenom II X4 940 
RAM: 2048 MB / 4096 MB 
Free space on hard disk: 14660 MB 
Video card: GeForce 8800GT or Radeon HD4850, (512 MB), (Shader Model 4.0), (DirectX 10) / GeForce 600 or Radeon HD7000, (1024 MB), (Shader Model 5.0), (DirectX 10) 

Starting: 

run the file: AC4BFSP.exe (pops up when a plate with kryakozyaby click ok and play)
